problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,∠C=90°,∠B=30°AC=3,点P是BC边上的动点,则AP的长不可能是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = N_0, ∠B = N_1 AC = N_2, point P is a moving point on BC, then the length of AP cannot be ()
raw_answer: 根据垂线段最短,可知AP的长不可小于3;∵△ABC中,∠C=90°,AC=3,∠B=30°,∴AB=6,∴AP的长不能大于6,故选D.
notes: 求AP长度不可能是？有点超出范围了
